betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You can let the parasites evolve §eto get strong armor and weapons§r (§7or if you're just a complete idiot§r). You can craft a §eliving weapon and living armor§r (§eor find it through dungeons§r).

Kill a couple of §cyelloweyes§r, §clongarms§r, §cany assimilated creature§r (§7do this very early as assimilated creatures evolve into feral ones later on§r), §creekers§r, §csummoners§r and §cmanducaters§r.
